fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Sword**: Play any attacking card, it will be upgraded if possible. You may gain an additional use of this at any time by sacrificing any 3 cards. (0 uses)
- **Save**: Pick a player and lose 2 HP. That player will gain death immunity this night and secretly be Lynchproof the next day. (2 uses)
- **Ascend**: Sacrifice yourself this night. You may play cards when dead and draw 2 each night start. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Frail**: You die if you reach 1 HP, rather than 0.
